game.title: Find the lost cat
game.objective: Return the lost cat to its owner
game.description: The cat named Whiskers has been missing for days. Please find and return it to its owner, Mrs. Johnson.

task.objective: Talk to Mrs. Johnson about the lost cat
task.description: Find Mrs. Johnson in her house and ask about the lost cat, Whiskers.
task.location: Johnson House, near the town center

task.objective: Find clues about the cat's last known location
task.description: Search for evidence or information that could lead you to Whiskers.
task.location: Various locations throughout the town, depending on the clues gathered

task.objective: Find and return the lost cat to Mrs. Johnson
task.description: Once you have located Whiskers, return it to Mrs. Johnson.
task.location: Johnson House, near the town center
